thread.title: Lowe's keeps targets despite sales miss

title: Lowe's keeps targets despite sales miss
text:
Lowe's keeps targets despite sales miss 11:02am EDT - 00:57
Lowe's posted disappointing quarterly earnings, blaming bad weather. But as Fred Katayama reports, the home improvement retailer is maintaining its annual profit forecast. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Lowe's posted disappointing quarterly earnings, blaming bad weather. But as Fred Katayama reports, the home improvement retailer is maintaining its annual profit forecast.
